content: Whisper MSG ROUND 3 Bounty campaign has officially ended.Spreadsheet will be finalized by the bounty manager and rewards will be distributed right after.[EDIT]8/15/22Bounty rewards distribution is complete. See the spreadsheet for the transaction details.  [WEBSITE]   [TELEGRAM]   [TWITTER]   [YOUTUBE]   [ANN THREAD]   [DOWNLOAD WALLET]  Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.
